front: The longest war in history was between [the Netherlands] and [the Isles of Scilly]
back: It lasted 335 years (1651â€“1986) with zero casualties

front: What animal can survive in the vacuum of space?
back: Tardigrades (water bears)\nThey enter a state called cryptobiosis
$0$\nOften called the most beautiful equation in mathematics

front: The sum of all natural numbers $1 + 2 + 3 + \cdots$ is sometimes assigned the value
back: $-\frac{1}{12}$\nVia Ramanujan summation and the Riemann zeta function $\zeta(-1)$

front: At room temperature the only two liquid elements are [mercury] and [bromine]
back: Mercury (Hg) is a metal\nBromine (Br) is a halogen

front: The maximum mass a white dwarf star can have is called the [Chandrasekhar limit]
back: $\approx 1.4 M_\odot$\nAbove this it collapses into a neutron star or black hole

front: In 1932 the Australian military deployed Lewis guns against crop-destroying [emus] and lost
back: This conflict is known as the Great Emu War

front: The last person to walk on the Moon was [Eugene Cernan] during Apollo 17
back: December 1972\nHis final words on the surface were addressed to his daughter
